qa.name: Captain Elias
qa.clothing: Worn fisherman's sweater and heavy boots

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the darkest of nights, a beacon of hope still shines.
json_to_edit.description: A lone lighthouse stands against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety.
json_to_edit.lighting: Alternating between pitch darkness and bright flashes
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Howling wind, crashing waves, distant thunder
json_to_edit.name: Guiding Light
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Elias mans the lighthouse during a fierce storm, helping lost ships find their way.

qa.action: A massive lighthouse stands tall on a jagged cliff, waves crashing against the rocks below.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the winding staircase inside the lighthouse, his lantern swaying.

tr.action: The captain checks the intricate mechanism that powers the lighthouse's rotating beam.

xc.action: Elias's weathered hands light an old oil lamp, adding to the lighthouse's glow.

ka.action: The lighthouse beam cuts through the stormy night, illuminating the turbulent sea.

fn.action: Captain Elias peers through binoculars, spotting a ship struggling in the distance.

af.action: The captain's worried face as he radios for additional help from the coast guard.

qo.action: The lost ship gradually makes its way towards safer waters, guided by the lighthouse.

fp.sfx_keywords: sigh of relief, wind dying down
fp.action: As dawn breaks, Captain Elias watches the rescued ship dock safely in the nearby harbor.

edit_command: Change the plot so that the lighthouse is haunted and Captain Elias is trying to uncover its dark secrets while still guiding ships to safety.

updated_json.voice_over: In the darkest of nights, a beacon of hope still shines, but what secrets does it hide?
updated_json.description: A lone lighthouse stands against the raging storm, guiding lost souls to safety while harboring dark mysteries within its walls.
updated_json.lighting: Alternating between pitch darkness, bright flashes, and eerie glows
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Howling wind, crashing waves, distant thunder, ghostly whispers
updated_json.name: Guiding Light and Dark Secrets
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Elias mans the haunted lighthouse during a fierce storm, helping lost ships find their way while trying to uncover the building's dark secrets.

qa.action: A massive lighthouse stands tall on a jagged cliff, waves crashing against the rocks below. A spectral mist swirls around its base.

hf.sfx_keywords: creaking wood, wind whistling, faint whispers
hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the winding staircase inside the lighthouse, his lantern swaying. Shadows seem to move independently on the walls.

tr.sfx_keywords: mechanical whirring, glass clinking, ethereal hum
tr.action: The captain checks the intricate mechanism that powers the lighthouse's rotating beam. He notices strange symbols etched into the metal.

xc.sfx_keywords: match strike, flame ignition, spectral whisper
xc.action: Elias's weathered hands light an old oil lamp, adding to the lighthouse's glow. The flame flickers unnaturally, casting bizarre shadows.

ka.sfx_keywords: thunder rumble, rain pelting, ghostly wail
ka.action: The lighthouse beam cuts through the stormy night, illuminating the turbulent sea. A ghostly figure briefly appears in the light, then vanishes.

fn.sfx_keywords: binoculars adjusting, concerned grunt, eerie creaking
fn.action: Captain Elias peers through binoculars, spotting a ship struggling in the distance. Behind him, a door slowly opens on its own.

af.sfx_keywords: radio static, urgent voice, spectral interference
af.action: The captain's worried face as he radios for additional help from the coast guard. The radio crackles with unexplainable voices and sounds.

qo.sfx_keywords: ship horn blaring, waves crashing, phantom bell
qo.action: The lost ship gradually makes its way towards safer waters, guided by the lighthouse. A ghostly bell tolls, seemingly aiding the ship's navigation.

fp.sfx_keywords: sigh of relief, wind dying down, mysterious whisper
fp.action: As dawn breaks, Captain Elias watches the rescued ship dock safely in the nearby harbor. He turns back to the lighthouse, determined to uncover its secrets.

label.rationale: we will update the json to incorporate the new haunted lighthouse plot while maintaining captain elias's role in guiding ships to safety. this will involve modifying the scene summary, voice over, description, and several shots to introduce supernatural elements and a mystery for captain elias to uncover. we'll keep the core structure of the scene intact while adding these new elements to create a more intriguing and suspenseful atmosphere.
